page.title: 15RECREATION
page.content: {SPORTS CENTRE }A Sports centre is being built in Speke. It is linked to the swimming baths. In the gymnasium basketball, football and other sports will be provided. There will also be a sauna. {SWIMMING BATHS}The swimming baths is a place to go when there is nothing to do. The school goes to the swimming baths every week. The pool is three feet deep at one end and ten feet deep at the other. If you cannot swim there is a swimming club called the Penguins which you can join where there are experienced teachers who will teach you how to swim. {FOOTBALL ACTIVITIES}There are several senior football teams in our area, the Public Houses all have teams, which play on Saturdays and Sundays. They use the local recreation and school playing fields.
